Summary: Silver long, cylinder (100-150 yards long) w/ quicksilver color and 5-7 bright lights evenly spaced along the side.
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Newark
There were no other sightings in Newark on or around July 2nd 2007
divs: Sighting DetailsOn I-78 West in direction of Newark airport from Hoboken. I looked towards horizon and I saw the object moving slowly if moving at all. It looked to be about 200-300 feet off the ground. It just sat there and as the highway veared to the right and my wife kept watching until it was out of our view. I fly 75% of the year and this was no airplane. My wife saw as well and what we saw, definately no airplane. It had a quicksilver look to it and had about 5-7 bright lights along the side of it.
